document_data.name: ''Ring of Lesser Resistance''
document_data.location: [[Dorn's Deep]], [[Spine of the World]], [[Gloomfrost Caverns]], [[Icewind Dale]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rings of lesser resistance''''' and '''''rings of greater resistance''''' were enchanted [[ring]]s that protected their wearers from spells.
document_data.Description: ''Rings of lesser and greater resistance'' were bands of precious metal that varied in design but had similar enchantments placed on them.
document_data.Powers: ''Rings of lesser resistance'' possessed enchantments that protected the wearer from spells and similar magics, while their stronger versions, ''rings of greater resistance'' provided greater resistance to spells, a ''+2'' enchantment to physical defenses, and granted resistance to crushing damage.
document_data.History: By [[1281 DR]], these rings could be found in the vicinity of [[Ten Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]]. [[Malavon Despana]], a powerful [[drow]] [[wizard]], kept one such ring in his throne room inside [[Dorn's Deep]]. And lesser variations could be purchased from [[Tiernon]], a blind [[dwarf|dwarven]] smith of the [[Clan Hearthstone]] in the Gloomfrost Caverns.
